About openDANES

openDANES is a platform for tutorials and white papers about using computational methodologies for ancient Near Eastern studies.

Contact us

Email: digpasts@gmail.com

Projects in the Digital Pasts Lab have been supported by the Ministry of Science & Technology, Israel, Grant 3-16464, and the Israel Science Foundation, Grant 457/19

We were kindly provided permission to use all images of cuneiform tablets on this site by Klaus Wagensonner © Yale Babylonian Collection

Website developed by Avital Romach
